title: T205's--20 graded + 3 raw, w. h-o-f, SP, Sov. and Cycles--

posts.post_title: T205's--20 graded + 3 raw, w. h-o-f, SP, Sov. and Cycles--
posts.post_content:
Email [no pm's, please; my pm box is constantly full] [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url]
PPff [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] [Regular paypal, add 3%].  Checks okay. 

First to say he'll take a card gets it.
Flat-rate $3 S/H, no matter how many. 
Discounts for combined shipping/multiple items.
